public class OrganizerEntrantsActivity extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
OrganizerEntrantsActivity Lottery-style management screen for a single event. - Shows stats: waiting, selected, cancelled, total spots. - Tabs: Waiting / Selected / Cancelled / Final. - List of entrants with checkbox + status badge. are assumed to store EMAIL strings.

      Loads entrant data for a list of emails. Looks up name from users collection and adds to the RecyclerView.

      private void setupPosterPicker()
      Sets up ActivityResultLauncher for poster image picking.

    • openPosterPicker

      private void openPosterPicker()
      Opens gallery to pick a new event poster image.

    • uploadNewPoster

      private void uploadNewPoster()
      Uploads new poster image to Firebase Storage and updates event document with new URL.

    • showCustomMessageDialog

      private void showCustomMessageDialog(OrganizerEntrantsActivity.CustomMessageCallback callback)
      Shows dialog for typing a custom message. Returns message through callback when "Send" pressed.

    • exportFinalListAsCsv

      private void exportFinalListAsCsv()
      Exports the FINAL entrants list as a CSV file.

    • fetchEntrantDetails

      private void fetchEntrantDetails(List<String> emails)
      Fetches name/phone for each email in final list and builds CSV string.

    • saveCsvToFile

      private void saveCsvToFile(String csvData)
      Saves built CSV content into Downloads folder.

    • removeEntrantFromSelected

      private void removeEntrantFromSelected(String email)
